meanings: 추대하다 have ((a person)) as head[president, director], be under (the presidency of)
have Dr. Kim as[for] the director of the school
have a dignified person as the president

vlive.korean: 사랑합니다. 우리 이제 태진 씨는 우리에게 항상 추대되는 걸로. Love you. Let's invite him as the emcee for every event. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Replay] tvN안투라지 앞터V(tvN Entourage's Early Interview)
vlive.english: Love you. Let's invite him as the emcee for every event.

examples.korean: That club is under the presidency of Dr. Lee. 발음듣기 그 클럽은 이 박사를 회장으로 추대하고 있다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That club is under the presidency of Dr. Lee. 발음

examples.korean: We selected Mr. Kim as president. 발음듣기 우리는 김 선생님을 회장으로 추대했다 Neungyule
examples.english: We selected Mr. Kim as president. 발음

examples.korean: They wanted to crown Wang Geon as their new king. 발음듣기 이들은 왕건을 새로운 왕으로 추대하기를 원했다. Neungyule
examples.english: They wanted to crown Wang Geon as their new king. 발음

examples.korean: He became the honorary chairman of the association. 발음듣기 그는 협회의 명예 회장으로 추대되었다 Neungyule
examples.english: He became the honorary chairman of the association. 발음

examples.korean: Shi'ites nominated al-Maliki Friday. 발음듣기 시아파는 금요일에 알-말리키 씨를 총리 후보로 추대했습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
